page.title: 04FARMING MACHINERY,ROXWELL
page.content: There is a lot of Farm Machinery in the area because there is a lot of farming. There are several{Combine {Harvesters}because most land is used for growing crops such as Barley, Oats Wheat and Oil seed rape. They cut down the{CORN}. Inside the Combine Harvester the stalks are taken off the plants and that drops out of the back. That straw is later bailed by a bailer and used for animals to sleep on. Then the ears of wheat are threshed. When the Combine Harvester is full a tractor with a trailer on the back comes beside it and a funnel comes out and the grain is blown out into the trailer. {Tractors}are used on the farms. They pull ploughs, fertiliser sprays, trailers, bailers and many other things. Tractors cost about Â£20,000.
